The hand cranked weblog of Alice Bartlett

Alice Bartlett

I work at the Financial Times on their components library, Origami. I used to work at The Government Digital Service (GDS), BERG, FT Labs (formerly Assanka) and IBM. I'm also the founder of the lady-bung empowerment franchise, tampon.club.
